desc: Coyer Candle Co. products are hand-poured soy wax candles and air fresheners handmade in Michigan. Our goods are triple scented for long lasting scents.

layout.text: SUMMER JUST GOT A LITTLE SWEETER

If you love sweet treats in the summertime, you'll for sure enjoy our Summer Sweet Treats candle collection!
Pick any of our 10 scents from June 17 - 24, and they're only $12.99! Use Code: "sweets" at checkout.
